## FieldLabelSerializable class

Class for a non-editable, serializable text field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldLabelSerializable extends FieldLabel 
```
**Extends:** [FieldLabel](./blockly.fieldlabel.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(value, textClass, config)](./blockly.fieldlabelserializable._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>FieldLabelSerializable</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.fieldlabelserializable.editable.md) |  | boolean | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. This field should not. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fieldlabelserializable.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the XML renderer, non-serializable fields are not. This field should be serialized, but only edited programmatically. |
